entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
